text: {{Infobox settlement | name = | native_name = Bezirk Steyr-Land | native_name_lang = de | settlement_type = District | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Austria | subdivision_type1 = State | subdivision_name1 = Upper Austria | subdivision_type2 = Number of municipalities | subdivision_name2 = 21 | subdivision_type3 = | subdivision_name3 = | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = | seat = | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 971.7 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 57,611 | population_as_of = 2001 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +01:00 | timezone1_DST = CEST | utc_offset1_DST = +02:00 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = Telephone prefix | area_code = | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = | blank_name_sec1 = NUTS code | blank_info_sec1 = }} The Steyr-Land District () is a district in the state of Upper Austria in Austria. It has an area of 971.7 km². As of 1 January 2019, 60,427 people lived there. The administrative center of the district is Steyr. The district has 21 municipalities: * Adlwang * Aschach an der Steyr * Bad Hall * Dietach * Gaflenz * Garsten * Großraming * Laussa * Losenstein * Maria Neustift * Pfarrkirchen bei Bad Hall * Reichraming * Rohr im Kremstal * Schiedlberg * Sierning * Sankt Ulrich bei Steyr * Ternberg * Waldneukirchen * Weyer * Wolfern Category:Districts of Upper Austria
title: Steyr-Land District
